lines.text:
[Dave and Bob are dressed as hippies to get into a road protesters' camp]
You're loving this, aren't you?
lines.character: Detective Constable David 'Dave' Ian Lovelace Briggs

lines.text:
[flicking his long blonde wig around]
What?
lines.character: Detective Constable Robert 'Bob' Elvis Aaron Louis
Detective Constable David 'Dave' Ian Lovelace Briggs

lines.text: See the sugar bowl? That's drugs! What you do is, you rub in on your gums and see if it tingles.
lines.character: Detective Constable Robert 'Bob' Elvis Aaron Louis

lines.text: [They start rubbing the "sugar" into their gums]

lines.character: Detective Constable David 'Dave' Ian Lovelace Briggs
Detective Constable Robert 'Bob' Elvis Aaron Louis
Detective Constable David 'Dave' Ian Lovelace Briggs

lines.text: ...It's more of a tickle, than a tingle.
lines.character: Detective Constable Robert 'Bob' Elvis Aaron Louis

lines.text:
[Driving the police car, stoned]
More Oxo!
lines.character: Detective Constable Robert 'Bob' Elvis Aaron Louis
